prompt:
{
    "version": "Da Hanh Studio v4.0",
    "concept": "A hyperrealistic cinematic lifestyle portrait of a young woman in a ribbed knit lounge set, capturing an intimate and relaxed moment in an open-air forest cabin setting with soft natural daylight.",
    "source_image": {
        "description": "Prompt-based generation — no uploaded reference provided.",
        "preserve_identity": true,
        "match_face_100": true,
        "maintain_composition": true,
        "enhancement_goal": "Render lifelike texture, lighting realism, and soft atmospheric depth in 8K HDR cinematic tone while preserving identity."
    },
    "character": {
        "gender": "female",
        "age": "early 20s",
        "ethnicity": "Caucasian",
        "body": {
            "build": "Slender and fit",
            "proportions": "Natural proportions with defined curves",
            "posture": "Relaxed yet confident, leaning slightly forward",
            "pose": "Kneeling on a bed, body angled three-quarters, one hand resting on bedding, other hand near knee"
        },
        "face": {
            "features": "Refined features, soft natural beauty",
            "expression": "Calm, confident, and inviting",
            "gaze": "Direct eye contact with the camera lens",
            "makeup": "Natural makeup with warm tones and subtle eye definition",
            "skin": "Natural texture, glowing and realistic"
        },
        "hair": {
            "color": "Chestnut-brown",
            "length": "Long",
            "style": "Softly waved, parted at the center",
            "movement": "Static, draping naturally over shoulders",
            "texture": "Soft, silky, and voluminous"
        }
    },
    "clothing": {
        "outfit": "Light beige ribbed knit two-piece ensemble",
        "design": "Deep V-cut halter bralette with thin straps and circular ring connectors at chest; matching high-waisted form-fitting knit pants",
        "material_detail": "Soft, matte, textured ribbed knit fabric",
        "style": "High-end loungewear / Casual luxury",
        "accessories": [
            "Minimal styling",
            "Circular ring connectors on bralette"
        ]
    },
    "setting": {
        "location": "Open-air wooden cabin or balcony bedroom",
        "environment": "Intimate bedroom space opening into nature",
        "details": "White bedding in foreground, dark wooden railing horizontally behind subject, lush forest greenery in background",
        "lighting_source": "Natural daylight from open side of cabin",
        "atmosphere": "Peaceful, intimate, fresh, and natural",
        "weather": "Daytime, soft light",
        "depth_elements": "White bedding in foreground, blurred forest trees in background (bokeh)"
    },
    "lighting": {
        "type": "Natural daylight",
        "direction": "Side/Frontal (diffused)",
        "intensity": "Soft and diffused",
        "color_temperature": "Neutral to Warm (5000K-5500K)",
        "effect": "Gentle highlights on face, shoulders, and torso; smooth shadows for depth",
        "contrast": "Soft contrast",
        "fill_light": "Natural ambient fill"
    },
    "camera": {
        "angle": "Eye-level to slightly above subject",
        "shot_type": "Medium-full shot (mid-thigh upward)",
        "lens": "50mm or 85mm prime lens",
        "depth_of_field": "Shallow (f/1.4-f/2.0) for background separation",
        "focus": "Sharp focus on eyes and face",
        "composition": "Clean and balanced, subject centered, framed by bedding",
        "render_target": "8K HDR photorealistic lifestyle fashion portrait"
    },
    "style": {
        "art_direction": "High-end lifestyle and editorial fashion photography",
        "visual_quality": "8K ultra-photorealistic, DSLR-quality",
        "aesthetic": "Clean, intimate, natural, and sophisticated",
        "tones": "Warm neutrals (cream, beige, wood brown) and muted forest greens",
        "render_mood": "Serene, confident, and intimate",
        "reference_style": "Cinematic realism, high-end magazine editorial"
    },
    "color_palette": {
        "primary": [
            "Cream White (Bedding)",
            "Light Beige (Outfit)"
        ],
        "secondary": [
            "Warm Wood Brown (Architecture)",
            "Muted Forest Green (Background)",
            "Chestnut Brown (Hair)"
        ],
        "mood": "Warm, neutral, and organic",
        "harmony": "Analogous (Earth tones)"
    },
    "technical": {
        "resolution": "8K HDR (7680×4320)",
        "ratio": "16:9",
        "quality": "ultra-detailed, high-fidelity, professional-grade, hyperrealistic",
        "realism_engine": "path-traced with subsurface scattering",
        "exposure_control": {
            "iso": "100",
            "aperture": "f/1.4",
            "shutter": "1/250"
        },
        "tone_mapping": "ACES (cinema-grade color science)",
        "color_depth": "16-bit",
        "color_space": "DCI-P3",
        "post_process": [
            "professional color grading",
            "lens correction",
            "chromatic aberration removal",
            "sharpening",
            "micro-contrast enhancement",
            "vignette (subtle)",
            "skin retouching (natural)"
        ],
        "camera_simulation": "Phase One XF IQ4 150MP",
        "lens_simulation": "Zeiss Otus 85mm f/1.4 APO",
        "optical_effects": "Natural lens flare, creamy bokeh, vignetting"
    },
    "negative": {
        "exclude": [
            "no nudity",
            "no explicit content",
            "no blur or out of focus subject",
            "no overexposure or underexposure",
            "no cartoon or anime style",
            "no watermark or text overlay",
            "no distorted proportions",
            "no unrealistic skin texture",
            "no artificial or plastic look",
            "no noise or grain (unless intentional)",
            "no compression artifacts",
            "no duplicate elements",
            "no extra limbs or fingers",
            "no heavy makeup",
            "no messy background"
        ]
    },
    "artistic_intent": "To capture the seamless blend of comfort and elegance through a high-end lifestyle lens. The image should evoke a sense of intimacy and connection with nature, highlighting the texture of the knitwear and the natural beauty of the subject against a serene forest backdrop."
}.
